channel.title: Bounty Hunter
channel.description:
[size=30pt]Project delting[/size] [hr] What we've done : We made a Project Delting website We made a Forum . )in my signature( We're currently making a webclient. Almost done with the server.
[size=30pt]WE NEED A HOSTER TO :D Reply if you can host:) thanks, gl0wi[/size]
And i made a Bounty hunter MY WAY>.> Some pics of it:D :
get in bh [IMG]http://i342.photobucket.com/albums/o415/iPlayz/bh1.jpg[/img] Bh hall. [IMG]http://i342.photobucket.com/albums/o415/iPlayz/bh11.jpg[/img] The craters: [IMG]http://i342.photobucket.com/albums/o415/iPlayz/AS.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i342.photobucket.com/albums/o415/iPlayz/ASD.jpg[/img]
This is currently 50% done. Post your feedback^^

item.title: Bounty Hunter
item.dc:creator: @hig_golem hig golem
item.description:
@hig_golem wrote:

Cane you tell how you make it i got commands on my server (Berky-Scape) and i want that you can’t tele when you in it how i do plz help i want a bounty hunter to!

Read full topic

item.title: Bounty Hunter
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

for level requirements wouldn’t you just make it something like this just an example…

case ####: if(playerLevel[#] != ##) { sendMessage("You don't have the required level to enter this portal } else { teleportToX = <coord> teleportToY = <coord> } break;
something like that
the case #### would be the portals id, the playerlevel # would be whatever playerlevel for isntance 0 is attack, 19 slayer, thingsl ike that. The = ## is for what level you want it to be. By the way, if you want a certain combat level just ask and i’ll help you.

Read full topic

It’s just a starting, and i cant find a tut for lvl requirements ^^

if(playerLevel[level Id] >= level requirement) { stuff that you are allowed to do } else { sendMessage("You do not have the level requirement to get in"); }
